str2: First person singular of a past tense of opheilo; I ought, i.e. oh that!

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To endure, bear with, have patience with, suffer, admit, persist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Want of sense, foolishness, impiety, wickedness. From aphron; senselessness, i.e. egotism; recklessness.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To endure, bear with, have patience with, suffer, admit, persist.
